::Autofire::

Autofire's scanner beeps, the bot glancing down at it. He frowns. The 
readings reported that there was an opening beyond the back wall. He walks 
over to it, looking it over from the cealing to the floor. His eyes narrow as 
he sees a small button to the side.

Stretching out a hand, he presses the button, jumping back as the wall slides 
into the floor, revealing a cavern. Autofire's eyes widen, his face settling 
into a grin in a few seconds. He walks into the cavern, looking at the 
vehicle inside. From the size of it, it was about a three-seater transport 
pod. It had two guns on its side, and another one mounted on its top.

Autofire smiles, walking forward to slide his hand across the smooth surface 
of the vehicle. He looks down at his scanners again, seeing their report. It 
was a sort of flying vehicle, good for transportation.

He turns to Adrax. "Hey, look at this," he says, pointing to the pod.
